Package com.espertech.esper.epl.join.rep

Outer join result set handling

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Repository An interface for a repository of events in a lookup/join scheme that supplies events for event stream table lookups and receives results of lookups.
 

Class Summary
Cursor This class supplies position information for LookupInstructionExec to use for iterating over events for lookup.
Node Node is the structure to hold results of event lookups in joined streams.
NodeCursorIterator Iterator over a set of nodes supplying node and event-within-node position information in a Cursor.
RepositoryImpl Implements a repository for join events and lookup results.
SingleCursorIterator A utility class for an iterator that has one element.
 

Package com.espertech.esper.epl.join.rep Description

Outer join result set handling
